# Basin { #ribasim.Basin }

`Basin()`

Input for a (sub-)basin: an area of land where all flowing surface water
converges to a single point.

## Parameters

| Name      | Type                       | Description                               | Default   |
|-----------|----------------------------|-------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `profile` | pandas.DataFrame           | Table describing the geometry.            | required  |
| `static`  | pandas.DataFrame, optional | Table describing the constant fluxes.     | required  |
| `forcing` | pandas.DataFrame, optional | Table describing the time-varying fluxes. | required  |
| `state`   | pandas.DataFrame, optional | Table describing the initial condition.   | required  |
